name: calculatefinesse
0:
”Alexa, inspect my cavity”
”What is the finesse of a cavity with transmissivities of 100 ppm and 20 ppm?”
”What is the storage time of a cavity with a finesse of 2000”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspect my cavity
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to convert between various characteristics of your optical cavity: finesse, storage time (also called the photon decay time) and cavity pole. These quantities can additionally be derived from optic transmissivities.

For more information on these quantities, see Wikipedia: Fabry-Perot interferometer (Theory section).
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
